title: Ant chair
body: The Ant Chair, inspired by none other than Arne Jacobsen, is a special style of an original mid-century design made famous in 1952. It was originally designed for the Novo Nordisk, a pharmaceutical firm of Danish origins, and bears a unique name worth noting as well ---- in addition to its gorgeous single-color birch wood that comes in numerous selections; pick from Walnut, Oak, Red, White, or Black. But for more about the product name’s..see the section to the right.
